content: looking for a cute quick and versatile crochet project look no further than this crochet onigiri pattern this small and easy-to-make crochet rice ball is perfect for beginners and seasoned crocheters alike **materials** ▢red heart yarn - white ▢red heart yarn - black ▢polyfill ▢10 mm safety eyes ▢5 mm hook ▢keychain ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** chains - chain magic_ring - magic_ring single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch increase - increase decrease - decrease
